statement.p: A thyroid peroxidase antibody test was performed on a 45 year old man. The dilution sequence was 15 \displaystyle\mu{L} serum added to 105 \displaystyle\mu{L} of diluent in tube 1. Then 70 \displaystyle\mu{L} from tube 1 was added to 280 \displaystyle\mu{L} of diluent in tube 2. Finally 20 \displaystyle\mu{L} from tube 2 was added to 120 \displaystyle\mu{L} of diluent in tube 3.
All dilution ratios should be given as fractions.
a.) What is the dilution ratio in tube 1?
b.) What is the dilution ratio in tube 2?
c.) What is the dilution ratio in tube 3?
d.) What is the overall (serial) dilution ratio?
